snippet: The parents of Austin Tice, a 31-year-old American freelance reporter, said that the Syrian government told them that it had no information about his whereabouts.
abstract: Parents of Austin Tice, American freelance journalist who has been missing in Syria for three months, say Syrian government has told them it has no information about his whereabouts.
lead_paragraph: The parents of Austin Tice, a 31-year-old American freelance reporter, said that the Syrian government told them that it had no information about his whereabouts.

headline.seo: Syria: Missing Journalist Austin Tice’s Parents Ask for Help
headline.main: Syria: Parents of Missing Journalist Appeal for Help
headline.print_headline: Syria: Parents of Missing Journalist Appeal for Help

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
